ipxact:component.ipxact:name: RBC

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: init
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set to 1, the core internal state is reset. After a 1 has been writen, the user needs to set it back to 0 if another reset is desired rising edge controled. Note that this does not affect the state of any user facing register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: init_done
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit signals that all transactions have been completed on the AXI interface

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables stream processing of the core. If this is set to 0, no input data is

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: switch
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If this is set to 0, then the first sample taken from the input data word is on the MSB, else if this is set to 1, then the first sample is taken from the LSB of the input data word.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: width
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Width of the input frame counted in pixels. Formula: Reset = 0x3ffff

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: height
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Height of the input frame counted in pixels Reset = 0xffff

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: format
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The following values may be written to this register: 0x0: 4:4:4 non-interleaved format 0x1: 4:2:2 non-interleaved format 0x2: 4:20 non-interleaved format 0x3: monochrome 0x4: 4:4:4 interleaved 0x5: 4:2:2 interleaved 0x6: 4:2:0 interleaved 0x7: reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: c0_sa
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Start address of buffer in the AXI memory. This must be aligned on an 8 sample boundary. ie. the address must be a multiple of 8

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: c0_ea
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size of buffer in the AXI memory. Value written is number of block lines that can be written to the buffer - 1. Minimum value is 0 (1 block line). Maximum supported value is specified by Maximum supported buffer size. To calculate the amount of memory space one block line occupies, see UG 5.2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ppe_n
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the number of pipes the unit was implemented with.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: dat_i_w
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the sample precision the unit was implemented with.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: axi_aw
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the number of address bits the AXI master interface was implemented with.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: axi_dw
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the number of data bits the AXI master interface was implemented with.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: par_axi_max_burst
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Implemented AXI maximum burst length The read burst length is such that it always reads 8 samples. If DAT_I_W=8, the burst length is 8/(AXI_DW/8) words. For DAT_I_W>8, each write burst would be 8/(AXI_DW/16) words.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: axi_max_burst
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
Specifies the maximum burst length that the AXI master will request (for both read and write). The read burst length is such that it always reads 8 samples. If DAT_I_W=8, the burst length is 8/(AXI_DW/8) words. For DAT_I_W>8, each write burst would be 8/(AXI_DW/16) words.
axi_max_burst = ((AXI_SAMP_W * 8)/AXI_DW) ; where AXI_SAMP_W = (DAT_I_W > 8) ? 16 : 8;

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: buf_adr_w
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the address size of the output sample buffers. The size of the buffer is 2^OUT_BUF_ADR_W words.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: par_axi_samp_num
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Implemented samples number per AXI data width

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: axi_samp_num
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the maximum number of samples transferred in a single AXI access.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: par_axi_samp_w
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Implemented width of one sample in AXI

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: axi_samp_w
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies how many bits one sample requires in the AXI memory.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: blks_s0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of blocks in Scan 0 - 1. Formula: Non-interleaved,mono: Interleaved 4:4:4: Interleaved 4:2:2: Interleaved 4:2:0: Value should not exceed the value specified in Maximum supported width Value should not exceed the value specified in Maximum supported height

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: mcu_rows_s0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of MCU rows in Scan 0 - 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: mcu_rows_s12
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of MCU rows in Scan 1,2 - 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: height_half
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Height of the input frame counted in pixels divided by 2 - 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: bls_s0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size of one line inside a MCU block line in buffer in bytes for Scan 0. Formula:

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: bls_s12
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size of one line inside a MCU block line in buffer in bytes for Scan 1,2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: intlv_imp
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Core supports interleaved formats (4:2:0 set separately)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: max_buf_bl
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the maximum number of block lines that can be set in register Component 0 end address

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: blks_mcu_row_s12
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of blocks in a MCU block line for Scan 1,2

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: blks_mcu_row_s0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of blocks in a MCU block line for Scan 0

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: The number of bits in each input sample (range 8-12).

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_TYPE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Input sample type. 0 - unsigned input, 1 - signed input.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: AXI_DW
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: AXI bus data widths (32,64 or 128(if DAT_I_W==12))

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: OUT_BUF_ADR_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Width of the output buffer address. Minimum is 3.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: MAX_WIDTH_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Maximum width of a frame that can be processed ((2**MAX_FRAME_W)-1)

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: MAX_HEIGHT_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Maximum height of a frame that can be processed (2**MAX_FRAME_W)

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: MAX_BL_IN_BUF_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Maximum number of blocklines that can be stored in the AXI memory ((2**MAX_BL_IN_BUF)-1)

ipxact:component.ipxact:description: The Raster-to-Block converter is a supporting unit for the Beyond JPEG Encoder core, designed for ease of integration. The role of the Raster-to-Block converter is to order incoming image samples (in a line-by-line format) into a sequence of blocks accepted by the encoder core.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: The number of bits in each input sample (range 8-12).

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_TYPE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Input sample type. 0 - unsigned input, 1 - signed input.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: AXI_DW
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: AXI bus data widths (32,64 or 128(if DAT_I_W==12))

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: OUT_BUF_ADR_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Width of the output buffer address. Minimum is 3.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: MAX_WIDTH_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Maximum width of a frame that can be processed ((2**MAX_WIDTH_W)-1)

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: MAX_HEIGHT_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Maximum height of a frame that can be processed (2**MAX_HEIGHT_W)

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: MAX_BL_IN_BUF_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Maximum number of blocklines that can be stored in the AXI memory ((2**MAX_BL_IN_BUF)-1)

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: AXI_SAMP_NUM
